SEARCH
Package Client.View

Class CountdownTimer

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
Client.View.CountdownTimer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class CountdownTimer extends Thread
CountdownTimer is a thread-based timer that counts down from a specified number of minutes. It supports pausing, resuming, and logging the time spent.

  • Nested Class Summary
